snippet.textDisplay: I'm trying to become a music composer and a song like this one may come across as very simple but hot damn if it that isn't the case. Making original music is hard and to think Toby composed the soundtrack for an entire game AND made that game  is insane. I'm gonna go sit down now before I get my ass humbled.
snippet.textOriginal: I'm trying to become a music composer and a song like this one may come across as very simple but hot damn if it that isn't the case. Making original music is hard and to think Toby composed the soundtrack for an entire game AND made that game  is insane. I'm gonna go sit down now before I get my ass humbled.

snippet.textDisplay:
Funny that this video goes up now, as I *just* decided to replay Undertale for the first time after my inital playthrough 2 years ago.
And my impression hasn't changed one bit: This game remains very fantastic!
snippet.textOriginal:
Funny that this video goes up now, as I *just* decided to replay Undertale for the first time after my inital playthrough 2 years ago.
And my impression hasn't changed one bit: This game remains very fantastic!

snippet.textDisplay: At this point, I just feel sorry for you, Jay.  You don't know how to stop letting random other people's opinions prevent you from being honest with yourself.  No one deserves that, and I hope you find yourself one day.
snippet.textOriginal: At this point, I just feel sorry for you, Jay.  You don't know how to stop letting random other people's opinions prevent you from being honest with yourself.  No one deserves that, and I hope you find yourself one day.

snippet.textDisplay: I don't see a single comment here that is out of line... why even bring negativity into this video?
snippet.textOriginal: I don't see a single comment here that is out of line... why even bring negativity into this video?

snippet.textDisplay:
"So you judge things based on completely irrelevant criteria? "

No.
snippet.textOriginal:
"So you judge things based on completely irrelevant criteria? "

No.

snippet.textDisplay: So you judge things based on completely irrelevant criteria?  Keep that asinine mentality if you want. As for me, I love Undertale because I think it's a great game, and I couldn't care less about the fandom.  It's not hard.
snippet.textOriginal: So you judge things based on completely irrelevant criteria?  Keep that asinine mentality if you want. As for me, I love Undertale because I think it's a great game, and I couldn't care less about the fandom.  It's not hard.
